title: Beverly Hills 90210 (Original) Trivia
desc: "There are better ways to get popular then advertising your sexual conquests." Who needs TV? We've got Days of our Lives right here! Join us at our Peach Pit for the evening known as the Essex Restaurant NYC on Sunday, November 29 starting 8pm for Beverly Hills 90210 (Original) Trivia! For reservations visit; https://90210Trivia.Eventbrite.com The best way to reserve tickets is by selecting a team captain and having them be in charge of tickets for ALL team members.? For example, if Dylan, Brandon, Brenda and Kelly are a team and Dylan gets put in charge, he will then reserve tickets for himself, Brandon, Brenda and Kelly = (4) in total.? PLEASE ONLY RESERVE SINGLE TICKETS IF YOU ARE PLAYING BY YOURSELF. We will send a confirmation email to everyone closer to the event. And remember, don't get too close you'll just get burned.
